creator: adityajain.2111@gmail.com
text:
I am using
 <fo:block break-after="page"></fo:block>

The above fo tag doesnt work.
Searched the below two links and tried applying that patch in my project but it didnt work.

https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=42600 
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=revision&revision=1026110 

But instead of breaking the page only once it is breaking it multiple times.
Can you please advice.

This is a duplicate of bug#50150

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 50150 ***
